title: Rainy city driving, almost stopped, with a parked truck on the side of the road.

description: The white car is driving slowly down a rainy city street. There is a parked truck on the side of the road, and a traffic light can be seen in the distance. reasoning: The white car is driving slowly down the rainy city street because of the wet road conditions. The driver is also aware of the potential risks of rainy conditions, such as reduced visibility and the possibility of hydroplaning. Therefore, the driver is driving at a slower speed to ensure safety.
